nodes.text: Joseph Stanley Williams is an American singer, songwriter and film score composer. He arranged the music for Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, and the documentary, From Star Wars to Jedi: The Making of a Saga. He also wrote the Engish lyrics for the song "Lapti Nek"[source?] and helped compose pieces from The Phantom Menace, Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and Return of the Jedi. He is the son of long-time Star Wars composer John Williams.
Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi (1983)
Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace (1999)
Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones (2002)
